column2:
'training or atch inference processes across a cluster of CPU or GPU compute nodes in'
'the cloud.'
'Create a compute cluster that will autoscale etween zero and four nodes:'
'1. Still in the Compute section, in the top ta, select Compute clusters.'
'2. Select +New to create a new compute cluster.'
"3. Keep all the defaults on the first page, select Next. If you don't see any availale"
"compute, you'll need to request a quota increase. Learn more aout managing and"
'increasing quotas.'
'4. Name the cluster cpu-cluster. If this name already exists, add your initials to the'
'name to make it unique.'
